message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Your share is decreasing faster than mine. Let's be reasonable while there's still a good deal for you.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
This is already a compromise. Every round you're losing money, Alice. Take the deal before it gets worse.
I know I'm losing money, but I still think I can get a better deal than your last offer
